headline: Wells Fargo Maintains Buy Rating on Applied Materials (AMAT), Keeps PT Steady
summary: On May 23, analyst Joseph Quatrochi from Wells Fargo maintained a Buy rating on Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) while keeping the price target of $200. The reiteration comes after the company released fiscal second quarter results for 2025 on May 15. Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) delivered $7.10 billion in revenue reflecting 7% year-over-year growth. Notably, […]
